{"lbauthTitle":"LB Auth","b1-title":"Location Based Authentication","b1-description":"Protect your company and it's users in an easy, comfortable and safe way","b2-title":"Your p******d is outdated","b2-text":"Identity management must be nowadays considered as an **essential** component for security in organizations. To address this need, Ironchip provides organizations with the scalability and security necessary to offer their users a consistent experience and a reduced risk of vulnerabilities.","b2-card1-title":"Get a notification on your device","b2-card1-text":"Communication for authentication is done over a **double-encrypted** channel which implements a **TLS plus** asymmetric elliptic key encryption.","b2-card2-title":"Authorize the access ‍ ‍ ‍","b2-card2-text":"We analyze the user's **location behavior** to validate their access. Location data is not saved, just the prediction algorithm to validate the location.","b2-card3-title":"No password, no friction","b2-card3-text":"We are the first solution to asure the identity of a user without the need to save their access information, **respecting the privacy** of your users. ‍","b2-text2":"Location based authentication provides a **100% customizable solution** to your needs. We combine the use of our location technology and our fraud detection AI to eliminate the reliance on passwords. We also have **more than 5,000 integrations available** to suit your every need.","b3-title":"One technology,
endless applications","b3-text":"**Maximum frictionless security**
Avoid the frustration of managing passwords, company keys and tedious controls. Manage three proofs of identity in a single interaction.","b4-title":"Managment Dashboard","b4-text":"Our centralized management platform has all the necessary tools and integrations to guarantee user management and protection of access to your most critical services.","b4-subtitle-1":"Role-based privilege management","b4-subtext-1":"Set different user privileges. Prevents unauthorized users from accessing the rest of the system and misusing information, mitigating malicious users.","b4-subtitle-2":"Restrict access from unauthorized places","b4-subtext-2":"Generate enabled access from authorized areas and take your security to the next level.","b4-subtitle-3":"Supervision of accesses in real time","b4-subtext-3":"Check user activity, view access on a timeline, get reports and download them for full control.","b4-subtitle-4":"Intrusion detection system (IDS)","b4-subtext-4":"Location-based reporting system to alert of sim swapping, phishing, device switching, etc.","b4-comment":"Boost your subscription with fraud detection features (IDS) and enjoy tracking incidents in real time, facilitating the minimization of unwanted accesses.","b5-title":"Live demos","b5-text":"Eliminate the dependency on passwords by using our apps or by implementing our SDK","b6-title-1":"More than
5000 integrations","b6-title-2":"and counting!","b7-title":"Supported devices"}
